mapper.select: select mado.section_name, mado.action_time, mado.process_code, mado.position_name, mado.line_name, (select count(material_id) from production_feature where position_id = mado.position_id and section_id = mado.section_id and action_time is null and finish_time is null) as waiting_count, (select count(material_id) from production_feature where position_id = mado.position_id and section_id = mado.section_id and operate_result = 2 and action_time between #{action_time} and DATE_ADD(#{action_time}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) as processed_count, (select count(p.material_id) from operator o join production_feature p on o.operator_id = p.operator_id where p.position_id = mado.position_id and p.section_id = mado.section_id and p.operate_result = 2 and p.action_time between #{action_time} and DATE_ADD(#{action_time}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) and not exists(select role_id from privacy_of_role where privacy_id in('100','101','107','108','109') and role_id=o.role_id)) as oem_count, (select count(material_id) from production_feature where position_id = mado.position_id and section_id = mado.section_id and operate_result = 3 and finish_time between #{action_time} and DATE_ADD(#{action_time}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) as stop_count from ( SELECT distinct a.position_id, a.section_id, c.name as section_name, date_format(e.action_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as action_time, b.process_code, b.name as position_name, d.name as line_name FROM position_of_section a join position b on a.position_id = b.position_id join section c on a.section_id = c.section_id join line d on b.line_id = d.line_id left join production_feature e on a.position_id = e.position_id and a.section_id = e.section_id where e.action_time between #{action_time} and DATE_ADD(#{action_time}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) and a.section_id = #{section_id} and a.position_id = #{position_id} ) mado
